entry.title: Deep Learning Fundamentals - Neuron and the Perceptron Algorithm
entry.summary: This is the first part of the series “Deep Learning Fundamentals”. The goal of this series is to explore the mechanisms of artificial neural networks. The focus is more on presenting an intuitive way of understanding neural networks. So, you can expect an emphasis on how and why things work rather than what does the job. More often than not I’ll try to use simple math without focusing on notation. Let’s jump into the fundamental unit of most of the neural networks - “a neuron”.
